=======================
nikola_import_wordpress
=======================

--------------------------------
Import your posts from wordpress
--------------------------------

:Manual section: 1
:Manual group: nikola

SYNOPSIS
========

**nikola_import_wordpress** url


DESCRIPTION
===========

Import your posts from wordpress.

SEE ALSO
========

nikola(1)
